name: Bonnie's Wrath
description:
(Before playing please note there are flashing lights, loud sounds and jump scares.)

This was my first attempt to make a horror game in Unity.  Any feedback is appreciated! 

Inspired by the original FNAF games and The Joy of Creation : Reborn

You are exploring a cave when you stumble upon a door that leads to what seems to be a laboratory. Out of your curiosity, you decide to investigate it, not knowing what may be lurking inside.
